channel.title: The Social Network of Hip Hop Artists on Social Artists
channel.description: Recent content in The Social Network of Hip Hop Artists on Social Artists

item.title: Data description
item.description: We have chosen to analyse the network of hip-hoppers since it is an interesting segment of musicians. Our hypothesis is that they tend to work and collaborate together a lot Libraries Many of the plots on this website are created using the plotly library and are interactive Most of the network analysis is conducted in networkx. Visualization in netwulf. Community detection with the python louvain packackage Explainer Notebook The linked jupyter notebook contains all the relevant analysis, which has been made in python.
